body:
Is the yellow hair a man or shemale ?
Whatever he/she is the best.

For those who don't understand I will try my best to describe a straight forward plot of this and the genre.
This can be vengeance or NTR depending on how you read the plot. It will be a vengeance if you look at the perspective of Minota and NTR from the perspective of Kanta.
Kanta is sort of a narcissist and like people surrounding him and he always has a lewd thought on his mother, cousins and aunt. He ALSO bullied Minota sometimes. One day Minota caught him pissed on someone else's grave. and he uses the video to blackmail his mother into sex. And the transformation starts there.
While adding Kanta pathetic way of his sexual thoughts to his surrounding relatives twisted the readers feeling sympathetic toward Kanta when the readers supposed to feel the opposite with Minota. He is the one getting bully all the time by Kanta so it's only naturally Minota took revenge on him.
Moral of the story: Don't bully people.
